mapper.sql: ids, parentid, menuname, murl, icon, status, createtime, creator, createname, updatetime, updator, updatename
mapper.insert: insert into mh_menu (parentid, menuname, murl, icon, status, createtime, creator, createname, updatetime, updator, updatename) values (#{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{murl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update mh_menu
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menuname = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
murl = #{murl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createname = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatename = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ids = #{ids,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mh_menu set parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menuname = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, murl = #{murl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createname = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatename = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ids = #{ids,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from mh_menu m where m.status='1'
and ids in (select um.menuid from mh_user_menu um where um.userid=#{ids})
order by ids

select 0, 100000, '菜单', null, 'fa fa-home', '1', null, null, null, null, null, null union select
from mh_menu where status = '1' order by ids
